statements: UPDATE impact_of_industrial_activities SET location='Factory A', activity_type='Manufacturing', impact_description='Pollution' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE impact_of_industrial_activities SET activity_type='Construction', impact_description='Noise pollution', location='City Center' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE impact_of_industrial_activities SET impact_description = 'Severe pollution' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE impact_of_industrial_activities SET location = 'City Center', activity_type = 'Manufacturing', impact_description = 'Increased emissions' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE ecosystems_impact SET impact_description = 'Severe impact on marine life' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_info SET threat_level = 'Endangered', population_size = 5000 WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Tropical Rainforest';
UPDATE ecosystems_impact SET impact_description = 'Severe damage caused by industrial spills' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_info SET population_size = 500, threat_level = 'High' WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE impact_activities SET impact_description = 'Increased habitat preservation' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ecosystem_information SET biodiversity_index = 90, region = 'Tropical' WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Rainforest';
UPDATE impact_activities SET location='Forest' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE activity_impact_mapping SET impact_level='Moderate' WHERE activity_id=2;
UPDATE impact_assessment SET impact_description = 'Updated impact description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_data SET habitat_type = 'Forests' WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE impact_assessment SET impact_description = 'New impact description', ecosystem_type = 'Forest' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE industrial_activities SET location = 'New York', company_name = 'ABC Corp' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE impact_on_ecosystems SET impact_description = 'Severe impact on marine biodiversity' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE biodiversity_data SET population_size = 5000, habitat_type = 'Forest' WHERE species_name = 'Tiger';
UPDATE impact_on_ecosystems SET impact_description = 'Severe damage caused by industrial waste' WHERE activity_name = 'Oil drilling'
UPDATE biodiversity_data SET habitat_type = 'Forest' WHERE population_size > 1000
